    • create

      public static <E> Pool<E> create(int initial, int max, Pool.IPoolFactory<E> factory)
      create a pool by initial, max and factory.
      类型参数:
      E - the element type
      参数:
      initial - the initial
      max - the max
      factory - the factory
      返回:
      the pool

    • destroy

      public void destroy()
      destroy the pool, and destroy all the object in the pool.

    • get

      public E get(long timeout) throws Exception
      get a object from the pool, if meet the max, then wait till timeout.
      参数:
      timeout - the timeout
      返回:
      the e
      抛出:
      Exception
